title: Seducing Virtue
description: When the truth is covered in several layers of lies, it’s nearly impossible to find the genuine core. Buried in the most unsuspecting place is a truth so explosive, if it is ever revealed, it will change everything.Keaton is tormented over finding out the true identity of the man she fell in love with. While she tries to move on with her life, he makes it nearly impossible.He knows the reason Keaton’s life transformed from nightmare into a living hell. Whether she’s receptive to the truth or not, he’s hellbent on exposing what was once buried.If the truth is revealed, Keaton may find herself susceptible to the most enticing seduction she has ever encountered.
author: Courtney Lane
